resources.string: Take a picture of a food item

ChowData was built by The AI Saturday Lagos Community.
For the purpose of collecting local food datasets which would then be used for building a local food recognition app called Chownet.
To see the list of food and we encourage you to add your suggestions, check this excel spreadsheet Chownet Food List.
For enquiries, Shoot Femi an email: azeezfemi17937@yahoo.com
Or Tejumade: tmafonja1@gmail.com
This app is open sourced at github.com/kantologist/Emergent
Other open sourced libraries used are listed below.
